lead_paragraph: The Dallas Police Department said it received 467 applications from people seeking to join the force in the two weeks after five officers were killed last month.

headline.print_headline: Hundreds of Police Applicants  Answer Dallas’s Call for Backup
headline.main: After Dallas Attack, Hundreds of Applicants Answer a Call for Backup

snippet: The Dallas Police Department said it received 467 applications from people seeking to join the force in the two weeks after five officers were killed last month....
abstract: Dallas Police Dept reports submission of 467 job applications in the two weeks after gunman killed five police officers;  Police Chief David O Brown and department see surge as show of support from community that could help bridge divisions between police and minority communities.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)
